cast.overview: Story of Rumi, his friendship with Shams Tabrizi, the love he had for him and the great influence of Shams over him in his life, his poetry and his love for God.
cast.title: Intoxicated by Love

cast.overview: A focused city worker and a laid-back surfer - both heirs to the same company - find they have plenty in common when they join forces in the boardroom.
cast.title: Chasing the Wind

cast.overview: Bilge and Can met in a hospital on New Year's Eve 1998 due to health issues. A magical moment shared as children forged a magical bond between them. Years passed, and life led them in different directions. Bilge became a successful lawyer, while Can made a significant discovery as an archaeologist. However, fate once again intertwined, and years later, their paths crossed once more. This time, the strength of that magical bond, which blossomed in their childhood, would be put to the test.
cast.title: İki Dünya Bir Dilek
